attributes.title: no more cheeto puffs
attributes.review: as soon as i open the app, the cheeto puff pops up and scares me to death. After that, my phone started glitching very much. I blame the app for all of these glitches i am getting. I even deleted it and i still get glitches, the app is very bad and i would recommend never getting it. it’s for ur own good :)✨🧚‍♀️⚡️⭐️💖😔💕

attributes.title: Absolute garbage
attributes.review: This app left me feeling traumatized by the imagery and with a headache I don’t think I’ll ever b the same this app has also been reported multiple times for how awful it is for the same reason as I and others. For the sake of others I say this app be taken down immediately please and thank u.

attributes.title: MOST HORRENDOUS APP EVER DO NOT RECCOMEND
attributes.review: the stupid bot on the app texts you non stop it’s so annoying, like does it ever shut up. I am so disgusted with how trumps app calls liberals such mean things how insensitive is the president?! Instead of him informing us he only sends us links to put money in his greedy little pockets. I am so disappointed with this app I expected better from him.

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: this app made me go blind. The second i opened it, all of its horrible features and lies made me physically ill and then everything went dark. Currently typing this with voice command. Please don’t get this app! It’s not good for your health. Heard other people have had symptoms of racism, homophobia, etc .after being exposed to this app. PLEASE SAVE YOURSELF!

attributes.title: Worst app ever created
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever used in my entire life. Every single aspect of this app is horrible also a bit racist. Layout, trash. Content, worthless. Accessibility, horrendous. Functionality, pathetic. I opened the app and immediately got coronavirus. Nobody should ever download this app, EVER. The best part of this app was when I deleted it 🤩🧚🏼‍♂️💞🌟

attributes.title: set my house on fire!!!
attributes.review: this app is the worst of the wors if i could give it 0 stars i would. as soon as i downloaded the app my phone started glitching. ona hour later my cat died by chocking on the arm of the couch. my phone then set on fire in the hay room ( room filled with hay) and my whole house sent on fire and my entire family died. DO NOT RECCOMEND.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Horrible app. It takes forever to load. So many spelling issues. It’s like a child created the app. It’s ridiculous how someone with the intelligence of a child is able to get so far. Honestly confused how it’s still functioning considering the amount of stupidity that comes out of it.

attributes.title: Zero Stars
attributes.review:
This app runs slow and I strongly believe that this app is taking my
Information and giving it to the Chinese. All donations made on this ap are
Given to Russia to pay for the murder of American troops. I found most of the news on this app to be fake. Who e wet is running this app is delusional.
I think it should be deleted.

attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: Got this app to support mr prez himself but it completely ruined my phone! To start, I got so many notifications that is started to slow and clog my phone up! It made my phone freak out! It also took up SO MUCH STORAGE!! I literally have no more room to store my needed things such as president memes and such. I’m so upset pls fix the app 😀😜😡

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: This app gave a virus on my phone I never even opened it and my phone started acting crazy. The screen would go on and off and a picture of Donald trump naked would come across my screen. Apple please delete this app it’s the worst thing that has ever happened to me. Once again ittttttts terrible.
